General.Name: Odessa Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Odessa Minerals Limited operates as a diamond mineral exploration company in Western Australia. It holds 20 granted and application exploration licenses in the Aries, Ellendale, Calwynyardah, and Noonkanbah Projects covering an area of 2,600 square kilometers in the Kimberley region of Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Fargo Enterprises Limited and changed its name to Odessa Minerals Limited in January 2022. Odessa Minerals Limited was incorporated in 1935 and is based in Perth, Australia.
